attributes.action: Jeremy clarkson freedom of speech and should not be fired for using the n word.
attributes.additional_details:
Sign this petition to show your support for Jeremy Clarkson the legend that is top gear
And show the world that freedom of speech should take paramount in this country (UK) once again.
England is becoming a land of moany paranoid victims that can't take words as harmless but instead claim distress or to be a victim.

Thicker skin is needed and these wimps need to stop complaining

Sticks and stones will break my bones but names can never hurt me...

show your support sign away
